column1: Airoli is a residential and commercial area of Navi Mumbai in the Indian state of Maharashtra.
It is a part of the Mumbai Metropolitan Region and is administered by Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation. It is connected to Mulund via Mulund Airoli bridge
column2: to Thane by Kalwa bridge and to the rest of Navi Mumbai via Thane Belapur Highway.

column1: Jnan Vikas Mandal's Mehta Degree College of Arts & Commerce
